mapper.select: SELECT UB.U_USERNAME, UB.UB_NO, S1.S_NAME S_NAMESTART, S1.S_DETAIL S_START_DETAIL, S2.S_NAME S_NAMELAST, S2.S_DETAIL S_LAST_DETAIL, UB.B_NO, UB.UB_ALIAS, UB.S_NOSTART, UB.S_NOLAST FROM UB JOIN S S1 ON UB.S_NOSTART = S1.S_NO JOIN S S2 ON UB.S_NOLAST = S2.S_NO WHERE U_USERNAME=#{u_username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UB(u_userName, ub_no, s_nostart, s_nolast, b_no, ub_alias) VALUES(#{u_username}, #{ub_no}, #{s_nostart},#{s_nolast},#{b_no},#{ub_alias})
